msg: Bug 56376 - When using Distributed Testing 'HTTP URL Re-writing Modifier' and 'HTML Link Parser' do not work with default mode nor stripping modes

author: markt
msg: Remove the ToC from the migration overview since the bulk of the content is just a set of links anyway

author: markt
msg: Enable Tomcat to detect when a WAR file has been changed while Tomcat is not running.
Note: Tomcat does this by adding a META-INF/war-tracking file to the expanded diretcory and setting the last modified time of this file to the last modified time of the WAR.
